content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For detailed information on hardware lifecycle, see the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCGAMPUB/Asset+description#Portfolioitems\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB article\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"See below the Hardware Lifecycle presented in the form of a diagram:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":377233,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/059d3122-b3e2-4111-ad76-5aa36faca550/Hardware lifecycle.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/059d3122-b3e2-4111-ad76-5aa36faca550/Hardware lifecycle.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Hardware lifecycle.png\",\"name\":\"Hardware lifecycle.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"059d3122-b3e2-4111-ad76-5aa36faca550\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":977,\"height\":919},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
